Package pieces

Interface DiagonalMover

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bishop, King, Queen
public interface DiagonalMover
Interface for pieces that can move diagonally
Author:
ibrahimkhajanchi, Karl Sequiera

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default boolean checkDiagonal​(int[] c1, ChessPiece cp1, int[] c2, ChessPiece cp2, Board chessBoard)
    Checks that the target piece, cp2, is on a diagonal of the source piece, cp1

  • Method Details

    • checkDiagonal

      default boolean checkDiagonal​(int[] c1, ChessPiece cp1, int[] c2, ChessPiece cp2, Board chessBoard)
      Checks that the target piece, cp2, is on a diagonal of the source piece, cp1
      Parameters:
      c1 - source piece coordinates
      cp1 - source piece itself
      c2 - target piece coordinates
      cp2 - target piece itself
      chessBoard - chess-board object
      Returns:
      true, cp2 lies on an empty diagonal, or false, cp2 isn't on a diagonal or cp2 is blocked by another piece
